description: Manage certificates on the attached device.

commands.name: az sphere device certificate add
commands.summary: Add a certificate in the attached device's certificate store.
commands.syntax:
az sphere device certificate add --cert-type {client, rootca}
                                 --certificate
                                 --public-key-file
                                 [--device]
                                 [--private-key-file]
                                 [--private-key-password]
examples: az sphere device certificate add --certificate certSample --cert-type rootca --public-key-file pubcert.pem
az sphere device certificate add --certificate certSample --cert-type client --public-key-file pubcert.pem --private-key-file privkeycert.pem --private-key-password 1234

commands.name: az sphere device certificate delete
commands.summary: Delete a certificate in the attached device's certificate store.
examples: az sphere device certificate delete --certificate certSample

commands.name: az sphere device certificate list
commands.summary: List certificates in the attached device's certificate store.

commands.name: az sphere device certificate show
commands.summary: Show details of a certificate in the attached device's certificate store.
examples: az sphere device certificate show --certificate certSample

commands.name: az sphere device certificate show-quota
commands.summary: Show the available free space in the attached device's certificate store.
